title: Romancing the Stars II
speaker: Michael Karkar
blurb: We all know how romantic the universe is. But it’s a bit large, no? How could you possibly figure out where to take that special someone on a date with all of the options available? Don’t fret - in this second installment of Romancing the Stars, a true expert in passionate celestial getaways will show you all the best spots for snuggling and stargazing - just in time for Valentine’s Day!
